description: Fincas VIllalobos exclusively offers this charming home with a pool. In a privileged natural environment, on the edge of an immense century-old pine forest, on the slopes of the Sierra de Gredos.. . A place of rest and connection with nature. With many corners that the orography itself develops in its extension, a variety of spaces where you can enjoy the natural environment.. . Cultivation area / vineyards, wooded area with pine trees, rocky area.. . it can even be a good place for stargazing due to very little light pollution. The farm has more than 2000m2 and is developed on a rustic land in which pines, vines and fig trees outcrop. It borders a seasonal stream and also has 2 wells. Fully fenced, with access gate and exterior walls. The construction has 119m2 segmented into: -62m2 of Housing -32m2 of swimming pool -25m2 of Garage/Warehouse Access to the house is paved from the exterior entry point. The house is developed with coherence and cohesion to the environment in its construction style and interior decoration. Stone floors, climalit wooden windows, wooden structures. It is segmented into 3 floors. Street plan: - Living room with fireplace - Kitchen - Bathroom - Room Upper Floor: - 2 rooms - Common spaces Low level: (not communicated with the house) -Woodshed/Storage room Equipment: - Fireplace and wood stove - Climalit windows - Water by drilling - Electricity by solar panels - Swimming pool with treatment plant - Kitchen and hot water with Gas. - Stone and Wood Floors - Garage Come visit it without obligation. Farms Villalobos S. L.

The kitchen is unfurnished but completely finished and in perfect condition, with the opportunity to design and create it to your liking. The 3 bedrooms are double and have large built-in wardrobes. And the bathrooms are fully equipped, the main one with four pieces and a bathtub. The second is a toilet. Located in Entrepinos. Very quiet area, with supermarkets, bus stops, sports courts and swimming pool. In a natural paradise within the Tiétar Valley. 3 km away. Cadalso de los Vidrios and Rozas de Puerto Real. Call now for more information about the home and to arrange a visit. Possibility of financing up to 100%.

REDPISO MADRID SUROESTE offers you exclusive housing for sale in Cadalso de los Vidrios, municipality of the Sierra Oeste of Madrid. Very bright exterior 4th floor with a constructed area of 85m² distributed in living room, kitchen, three bedrooms and a bathroom. The house has a large terrace with access from the living room with extraordinary views and another closed terrace with access from the kitchen. Equipped with air conditioning with heat pump. The stoneware floors. To enter to live. Housing in very good condition. Finca with fantastic pool. In its surroundings it has large green areas where you can go out and enjoy. Excellent location, very close to the urban center, where you will find all the services necessary for daily life (supermarkets, shops, health centers and other establishments). A residential place where you will have everything you need at your fingertips. The town of Cadalso de los Vidrios is located about 80km away. from Madrid. In a natural environment that combines olive trees and vineyards in a landscape of abundant tree vegetation complete with pines and oaks. Town with several assets of cultural interest such as the Palace of Villena and its gardens, the Church of Our Lady of the Assumption, Fuente de los Álamos.. . In the surroundings of Cadalso de los Vidrios, you can also find interesting and varied routes for hiking. Not far away is the San Juan Reservoir and the Iruelas Valley, on the banks of the Burguillo Reservoir. Cadalso de los Vidrios is reached by road: N-V until connecting with the M-507. Secondary road: N-V, exit San José de Valderas, to take the C-501 until connecting with one of the following: the M-541 at Pelayos de la Presa, the N-403 at San Martín de Valdeiglesias until connecting with the M-542 or directly along the M-542 past San Martín de Valdeiglesias. By public transport: Bus lines 545 and 546 from the Príncipe Pio bus station in Madrid. Call us without obligation and we will coordinate your visit. Don't hesitate to take advantage of this opportunity!

FULL VIDEO IN ADDITIONAL LINK ** 360 VIRTUAL TOUR AVAILABLE ** Rustic property of 21.5 hectares with a beautiful 525m² Alpine-style luxury chalet 50 minutes from Plaza de España, surrounded by nature, surrounded by forests.It has a stream with its own reservoir with a waterfall, an indoor swimming pool, a paddle tennis court, stables, sheds for animals and storage, its own well, mains electricity, etc. The farm is completely fenced and with good access from the road. Excellent qualities and state of conservation, since the use of the property has always been as a habitual residence. Located in a protected area of the Natura 2000 Network in the Special Protection Area for Birds called “CUENCAS DE LOS RÍOS ALBERCHE Y COFIO” / SPA “ENCINARES DEL RÍO ALBERCHE AND RÍO COFIO”, incredible environment, surrounded by nature, full of forests. and native fauna, where no one will be able to build nearby or take away the incredible views.Explaining the feeling experienced in this property is difficult to describe in words. 1440m² built in various buildings.Main area of 525m, 40m² swimming pool with telescopic cover, Paddle tennis court, 1 stone house with fireplace at the top of the property with views of the mountains, 1 wooden cabin in a tree, 500m² warehouse and 2 floors, another warehouse of 250m², another 110 m², and several more buildings of around 50m² each. The roof of the main building is made of gabled Segovian slate with attic windows.The floors and doors of the bedrooms and living-dining room are made of pine wood, with solid medieval-style doors, the same material is the access staircase to the 1st floor and its balustrade railing, the attic is carpeted, and the rest of the rooms They are paved with stoneware tiles of various shapes and colors. The Main House has 4 floors. SEMI-BASEMENT FLOOR 190m² approx. 50m² Games Room with billiards, table football, chess table, sofas and more, 1 cellar, 1 50m² garage, workshop, machine room and storage room. GROUND FLOOR 160m² approx. 2 living rooms with fireplaces, large kitchen with serving hatch to the living-dining room, 2 bedrooms sharing a full bathroom, incredible medieval hall, 200m² in 3 terraces (100m², 50m² and 50m²), plus the rear area with pergola and gazebo, tool shed and tools, bird and reptile cage, doghouse, etc.In the rear garden there is a small barbecue with a classic oven inside a granite stone building in masonry and a wooden and slate roof, it is independent of the house and has a bronze bell for possible notices within the property. FIRST FLOOR approx. 80m²: 2 very large bedrooms with their respective large en-suite bathrooms and 2 balconies overlooking the garden, another room that serves as an office and a beautiful wooden balcony with access from the hall via a wooden balustrade staircase. ATTIC 50m² approx: 2 attic rooms, carpeted and completely covered in wood (Valsaín pine - Segovia), with an insulating chamber on the ceiling, sharing a toilet, and a hall with a built-in wardrobe. All rooms on all floors have exterior windows, including those in the basement, with classic wrought iron grating. The energy comes from the electric company's grid.The water from the well that supplies the farm is fine and of high quality, and is not lacking throughout the year.It is stored in the closed 40,000 liter tank.It also has a diesel heating system. The terraces are south facing with beautiful views of the mountains from all rooms and living rooms, and in the north there is a large garden with limited stone flower beds and gazebos paved with Segovian slate. Firm offers will be carefully studied after the in-person visit to the property.
